mapper.select: SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-3) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE-3)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-2) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE-2)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE-1)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE+1) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+1)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE+2) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+2)

SELECT match_no,TO_CHAR(match_day,'MM.DD(DY)'),match_time,match_league,match_name,home_name,home_score,away_name,away_score,match_videokey FROM gggl_match WHERE match_day BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE+3) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+3)
SELECT team_name, team_icon FROM gggl_team WHERE team_name = #{team_name}
